For the cocktail: 1.75oz pink peppercorn-infused Roku gin 1oz Midori .5oz citric acid solution .25oz 2-1 simple syrup 1oz soda water Top with tarragon-lime foam Garnish with pink peppercorn kernels For the pink peppercorn gin: 30g pink peppercorn (1/2 cup) 750ml Roku gin sous vide 2 hours at 135°F For the tarragon-lime foam: 400g Lime juice 200g sugar 5g tarragon 3g salt 9g Foam Magic Method: Build in highball glass, add .25oz simple syrup, .5oz citric acid solution, 1oz Midori, 1.75oz infused gin, add soda and ice, stir to incorporate, top with tarragon-lime foam and garnish with pink peppercorn kernels
